newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazilian aluminium exports up 1.2 pct in 1996.
newsitem.headline: Brazilian aluminium exports up 1.2 pct in 1996.

text.p: Brazilian aluminium exports rose 1.2 percent in 1996 to 823,100 tonnes from 813,100 tonnes in 1995, according to the Brazilian Aluminium Association (ABAL).
Exports of ingots and alloys increased 0.9 percent to 709,000 tonnes from 703,000 tonnes in 1995.
Exports of semis and manfactured products rose 3.6 percent to 114,100 tonnes in 1996 from 110,100 tonnes the previous year.
Despite the 1.2 percent rise in the quantity of exports, revenue fell 10.9 percent, ABAL said. --Caroline Bulloch, Rio de Janeiro newsroom, 5521 5074151
